thread.title: MusicNews | Kanye West surprise-releases two new songs on Soundcloud
thread.title_full: MusicNews | Kanye West surprise-releases two new songs on Soundcloud - entertainment.ie

author: Lauren Murphy
title: MusicNews | Kanye West surprise-releases two new songs on Soundcloud
text:
Kanye West has uploaded two new songs to his Soundcloud page.
The rapper has reworked a version of his song 'Say You Will' - which originally featured on his ' 808s & Heartbreak ' album - with additional vocals by Caroline Shaw.
He's also made his song 'When I See It' - which was eventually recorded by The Weeknd under the title ' Tell Your Friends ' - available to stream, too.
West is rumoured to be working on the follow-up to ' Yeezus', although his plans remain as secretive as you may expect.
In any case, hear both of the newly-uploaded tunes via his Soundcloud page here (they're not embeddable, so you'll have to click on the link to hear them).
